title: Rock Mechanics
description: Rock characterization, scale effect, in-situ stresses, mechanisms of rock deformation and fracture, rock engineering; special attention to common principles unifying presented set of topics.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Cannot be enrolled in one of the following Levels:
__HEADER_1__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: CEE 6751 Graduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or EAS 6751 Graduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
